I'm a full-stack developer and have relevant experience building applications front to back. I'm self-motivated and have taught myself the programming languages and software systems I've needed up till now.

projects.title: TimeBlox: social productivity Chrome extension
projects.description: 50 daily users completing 3 tasks a day on average. Has add friend functionality. Created the application with ReactJS and AWS Amplify.

projects.title: Dawn: Blind Dating Mobile App
projects.description: Facilitated 5000 connections between 1300 registered users. App engaged 1000 users for an average of 15 minutes and 52 seconds on a daily basis. Designed, programed, and deployed the entire app with React Native and Google Firebase.

projects.title: ML Cognitive Temperature Analysis
projects.description: Collected EEG data of particpants perfoming congnitive tasks in cold and normal temperatues. Cleaned, pre-processed and fed data into various classification models. Determined best model to be XGBoost with 88% accuracy. Created using Python.

experience.title: Part-Time Web Developer/Tech Lead
experience.description: Implemented  visual display of tags for easy navigation which improved conversion by 15%. Used Hotjar to analyze scroll heatmaps and improved click-through of buttons. Improved Google page speed scores by 30 points.

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.description: Built Figma website displaying customer journey of crypto-powered purchasing. Website was used in demos for potential investors at tech conventions.
